alert.note: Alert for Lewis (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 2:23PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A RAPIDLY DEVELOPING THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL LEWIS COUNTY THROUGH 300 PM EDT... At 223 PM EDT, a rapidly developing thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Camp Dix, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Head of Grassy, Harris, Stricklett, and Emerson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
